TopicTitle: map view switch target on console?

Articles.Content: it used to be lb and rb would do it, but now i cant figure out which button does it

Keybindings depend on which preset you are in -- and you didn't specify.

Switch Target generally only works when you are within 2.2km of the other ship, in Flight mode.

Generally, it's the left and right arrows on your DPad.

If you are in map mode, the only way to switch targets is by zooming in on the new target and clicking on it.

I may be misunderstanding which function you mean, though -- if you think I am, please give me a little more detail.

For PS4 Enhanced Edition, default controls

Left Bumper and Right pad will switch active spacecraft if they are close enough.

Left Bumper and Right Bumper will switch between map and focused view, in map mode you can click on the new vehicle with the cursor and a pop up window will ask if you want to 'target vessel' or 'switch to'.
